ItemFound: ^Thank goodness the mage didn't do anything to you! You'll never be leaving my sight again.
^I don’t know how I could possibly repay you.
^Do you know where I could find the mage?
Directions: ^I saw a shadowy figure earlier, creeping down into the dark under the village. It could have been the mage.
^I'm not sure, but if you go looking for them...
^The only way down there is to go up above the village, first.
